examples.example: 我的生日那天，朋友们都赶来为我庆祝，让我十分感动。

translate.english: On my birthday, all my friends came to celebrate for me, which made me very touched.

examples.example: 每年生日的时候我都会收到许多美好的祝福，感觉特别幸福。

translate.english: Every year when it is my birthday, I will receive many wonderful blessings and feel extremely happy.

examples.example: 每次生日我都会收到亲人们精心准备的礼物，我真的觉得很幸福。

translate.english: Every birthday I will receive carefully prepared gifts from relatives, and I really feel very happy.
